name: BetterSelf
0:
”Alexa, open Better Self”
”Alexa, start counting with Better Self”
”Alexa, set emotion to excited”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: better self
des:
Better Self is an innovative Alexa skill designed to provide a fully customizable counting experience, allowing users to set the speed, emotion, and intensity of the counting. Whether you're a student looking to practice counting, a professional seeking relaxation through numbers, or someone who wants to have fun with numerical patterns, Better Self offers a unique experience tailored to your needs.

Core Functionality:

Customizable Speed: Choose from five different speed levels to count at your preferred pace.
Emotion Selection: Set the emotion of the counting voice, such as excited, calm, or neutral.
Intensity Adjustment: Adjust the intensity of the counting to match your mood or goal.
Interactive Counting: Respond to prompts to continue or stop counting, providing an engaging experience.
Getting Started:

Invocation: Simply say, "Alexa, open Better Self" to launch the skill.
Set Preferences: Use voice commands to set your desired speed, emotion, and intensity.
Start Counting: Begin the counting experience and interact with the skill as you go.
Supported Devices: Better Self is compatible with all Alexa-enabled devices.

Access Limitations: There are no specific location-based limitations or hardware prerequisites for using this skill.

Disclaimer: Better Self is an independent skill and is not sponsored or endorsed by Amazon. All intellectual property rights are owned by the developer, and any use of trademarks or brands is authorized.

Note for Users with Shopping Actions: This skill does not include shopping actions or make purchases on Amazon.

Note for Users Concerned with Food Safety: This skill does not provide food-safety information or dietary guidance.

Language Note: The content of this skill is in English. If you have selected a different language, please be aware that the skill's content will be delivered in English.

Explore the world of numbers with Better Self and discover a new way to count, learn, and relax. Try it today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
